item.description:
Hello Boston Townhall Members,

Tuesday, December 5th, will be the last Townhall meetup at my apartment. I got a great job in New Jersey, so I'll be moving in mid-December and stepping down as the Boston Townhall Organizer.

In order to keep our great group alive, a member can volunteer to do one of two things:

1. Become the organizer. Let me know. You'll have to pay Meetup.com around $10.00/month, and you'll be able to organize any other kind of group you want as well.

2. Organize yourselves through Townhall.com (or Townsquare). I'm trying to figure out how to do this, and I think it's probably the best way to go. I might be able to set it up for you. I'll let you know as soon as possible.

I look forward to seeing you in December.

Sincerely,

Lorene Leiter, Organizer
Boston Townhall Meetup
item.name: The Boston Townhall December Meetup
